text: Antonio Hardy (better known as Big Daddy Kane; born September 10, 1968) is an American rapper. He began his rapping career in 1986 with rap group the Juice Crew. In the late 1980s, Kane released his album It's a Big Daddy Thing. As of 2014, that was his biggest album. That album included songs like "Smooth Operator". Hardy was born in Brooklyn, New York. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Rappers from New York (state) Category:Musicians from New York City Category:1968 births Category:Living people
title: Big Daddy Kane
